superheroes.name: Spider-Man
superheroes.biography: Bitten by a radioactive spider, high school student Peter Parker gained incredible abilities and dedicates his life to protecting the people of New York City.

superheroes.name: Iron Man
superheroes.biography: A billionaire industrialist and genius inventor, Tony Stark creates a powered suit of armor to fight crime after being severely injured.

superheroes.name: Batman
abilities: Peak human physical and mental condition
superheroes.biography: Witnessing his parents' murder as a child, Bruce Wayne trains his mind and body to perfection and uses his vast wealth to fight crime in Gotham City.

superheroes.name: Wonder Woman
superheroes.biography: The Amazonian princess of Themyscira, Diana was raised to be an unconquerable warrior and serves as an ambassador of peace to the human world.

superheroes.name: The Flash
superheroes.biography: Forensic scientist Barry Allen is struck by lightning and doused with chemicals, gaining the ability of super speed and becoming the Flash.

superheroes.name: Super Man
superheroes.biography: Superman was born Kal-El, on the fictional planet Krypton. As a baby, his parents Jor-El and Lara sent him to Earth in a small spaceship shortly before Krypton was destroyed in an apocalyptic cataclysm. His ship landed in the American countryside near the fictional town of Smallville, Kansas, where he was found and adopted by farmers Jonathan and Martha Kent, who named him Clark Kent.
